channel.title: di on Zac's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in di on Zac's Blog

item.title: Use Hilt in Android
item.description: If you want to use dagger in your project, you may have 2 or 3 different sources, different samples, different blog posts. All of them use a different set-up, and all of them use Dagger in a different way, so it’s very difficult to understand all the topics and relate them together. So that’s why Google create a common guidance, a common ground.
